column1: Funeral services will be held at 2:00 PM on Monday
column3: 2015 in the Johnson Funeral Home Chapel. The Rev. Gary Evers will officiate. Burial will follow in Pujol Cemetery in Big Lake. Visitation will begin on Sunday from 3:00 PM until 9:00 PM and will resume on Monday from 8:00 AM until the start of the service.  PDF Printable Version
